trans-unit.target: 0.1-incubating-Apache初始版本

trans-unit.source: Agile OODT is a new version of Object Oriented Data Technology. It improves upon the previous version by being easier to develop, maintain, and extend; simpler to integrate by; and faster to use.
trans-unit.target: Agile OODT is a new version of Object Oriented Data Technology. It improves upon the previous version by being easier to develop, maintain, and extend; simpler to integrate by; and faster to use.

trans-unit.source: Agile OODT requires the Python programming language. We recommend version 2.4 or later. As of this writing, 2.7 is the latest stable version. If Python is not yet installed on your system, you can find binary and and source distributions from the Python website.
trans-unit.target: Agile OODT requires the Python programming language. We recommend version 2.4 or later. As of this writing, 2.7 is the latest stable version. If Python is not yet installed on your system, you can find binary and and source distributions from the Python website.
And for EasyInstall users, it’s:
Apache OODT

trans-unit.source: As a user with administrative privileges, run either:
trans-unit.target: 作为具有管理权限的用户,运行以下任意一种。
作为管理用户,运行。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to run that command as an administrative user. For example, on Mac OS X and other Unix systems, you might need to run either of:
trans-unit.target: 确保以管理用户的身份运行该命令。例如,在Mac OS X和其他Unix系统上,你可能需要运行以下其中一个命令。

trans-unit.source: By far the easiest, recommended, and encouraged way to install Agile OODT is either with Pip or EasyInstall. If your Python installation has either of these installers available to it, then one command is all you need to run in order to download, build, install, and generate command-line tools all in one go for all users on your system. For Pip users, it’s:
trans-unit.target: By far the easiest, recommended, and encouraged way to install Agile OODT is either with Pip or EasyInstall. If your Python installation has either of these installers available to it, then one command is all you need to run in order to download, build, install, and generate command-line tools all in one go for all users on your system. For Pip users, it’s:

trans-unit.source: Change the current working directory to the newly extracted directory.
trans-unit.target: 将当前工作目录改为新提取的目录。
变更日志

trans-unit.source: Download the Agile OODT source distribution and extract the source archive. The source distribution is packaged as a gzip’d tar archive.
trans-unit.target: Download the Agile OODT source distribution and extract the source archive. The source distribution is packaged as a gzip’d tar archive.
更多信息
完整说明

trans-unit.source: If neither Pip nor EasyInstall are available, you can still make a proper installation of Agile OODT by building it from its source code. Just follow these instructions:
trans-unit.target: 如果Pip和EasyInstall都不可用,你仍然可以通过从Agile OODT的源码中构建它来进行正确的安装。只需按照以下说明操作即可。
安装
从源头安装
问题追踪器(在此提交错误报告
OODT开发的邮件列表
OODT主页
包装页(奶酪店
快速说明

trans-unit.source: This is the current release of Agile OODT, representing its migration from the Apache Incubator to a full-fledged top-level Apache project.
trans-unit.target: 这是Agile OODT的当前版本,代表着它从Apache孵化器迁移到一个成熟的顶级Apache项目。

trans-unit.source: This release marks the induction of Agile OODT into the Apache Software Foundation’s Incubator.
trans-unit.target: This release marks the induction of Agile OODT into the Apache Software Foundation’s Incubator.

trans-unit.source: To test if a correct version of Python is available on your system, run:
trans-unit.target: 要测试您的系统上是否有正确的Python版本,运行。

trans-unit.source: Visit any of the following links for additional information, to ask questions, report bugs, and so forth:
trans-unit.target: 请访问以下任何一个链接以获取更多信息、提问、报告错误等。

trans-unit.source: What follows are the installation instructions for Agile OODT.
trans-unit.target: 以下是Agile OODT的安装说明。

trans-unit.target: 以下是该软件的变化历史。

trans-unit.target: 你应该看到类似的输出。
